Welcome.title: Welcome to Safa Residency
Welcome.subtitle: Experience Unmatched Luxury at Safa Residency
Welcome.description: Your gateway to world-class hospitality in the heart of Dhaka. Just minutes away from the airport and train station, Safa Residency offers a blend of comfort, luxury, and unforgettable experiences.

benefits.title: Find benefits of joining Safa Residency
benefits.description: Experience exclusive benefits, earn points, access member rates and enjoy more with Safa Residency.
